current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
Congratulating the North Dakota State
		  University football team for winning the 2012 National Collegiate Athletic
		  Association Division I Football Championship Subdivision
		  title.

cosponsor.#tail:
) submitted the following
			 resolution; which was considered and agreed to

text.#text:
congratulates the
			 North Dakota State University football team, the 2012 National Collegiate
			 Athletic Association Division I Football Championship Subdivision
			 champions;

commends the
			 North Dakota State University players, coaches, and staff for their hard work
			 and dedication; and

recognizes the
			 students, alumni, and loyal fans for supporting the Bison on their successful
			 quest to capture another Division I trophy for North Dakota State
			 University.

quote.#tail:
) Bison won the 2012 National Collegiate
			 Athletic Association (referred to in this preamble as the

text.#text:
Whereas the North Dakota State University (referred to in
			 this preamble as

Whereas the NDSU Bison and coach Craig Bohl had an
			 incredible 2012 season with 14 wins and 1 defeat;

Whereas NDSU has won 10 NCAA Football
			 Championships;

Whereas, during the championship game, the NDSU Bison
			 offense scored 39 points against the Sam Houston State Bearkats;

Whereas the leadership of President Dean Bresciani and
			 Athletic Director Gene Taylor has helped bring both academic and athletic
			 excellence to NDSU; and

Whereas the 2012 NCAA Division I Football Championship
			 Subdivision title was a victory not only for the NDSU football team, but also
			 for the entire State of North Dakota: Now, therefore, be it

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 SRES 32 ATS: Congratulating the North Dakota State University football team for winning the 2012 National Collegiate Athletic Association Division I Football Championship Subdivision title.
